transcription.text: Thor: Love and Thunder sees Thor (Chris Hemsworth) embark on a journey of self-discovery – which is suddenly interrupted by a galactic killer, Gorr the God Butcher (Christian Bale), who seeks to eliminate the gods. Thor joins forces with King Valkyrie (Tessa Thompson), Korg (Taika Waititi) and, to his surprise, ex-girlfriend Jane Foster (Natalie Portman), who now wields Mjolnir as the Mighty Thor, to understand the mystery of Gorr’s vengeance and stop him before it’s too late. Featuring 25 costume changes for Thor alone, the film is a visual feast. “Thor’s sort of searching for his identity, and that’s represented in his wardrobe,” Chris Hemsworth reflected. “The costumes and the sets aesthetically match the energy of the film — they’re another colour to the painting.”
